author: Alexander Mark Oppel
title: Midterm 2: Built-in functions
question: Hi, I was wondering if we will be expected to memorize all the built in functions from the language page on EdX?
student_answer: I believe so, since they will not be on the design recipes sheet they give us.
instructor_answer: The student answer is exactly write.  We haven't found that to be a problem, since once one does the work to understand the functions and how to use them their names are quite natural.
